# Data sources


## NYPD Complaints Dataset

```{r, results='asis'}
complaints.description.df = data.frame(Variables = c("CMPLNT_FR_DT"), 
                            Description = c("Date in %m/%d/%y, Exact date of occurrence for the reported event (or starting date of occurrence, if CMPLNT_TO_DT exists)")
)
knitr::kable(complaints.description.df, caption = "Major columns used in NYPD Complaints",
             row.names = F,font_size = 10)
```

### NYPD Arrest Dataset

```{r}
arrest.description.df = data.frame(
                            Variables = c("LAW_CAT_CD", 
                                          "ARREST_DATE"), 
                            Description = c("Text, Level of offense: felony, misdemeanor, violation",                                              "Date in %m/%d/%y, Exact date of arrest for the reported event"))
knitr::kable(arrest.description.df, caption = "Major columns used in NYPD Arrest",
             row.names = F,font_size = 10)
```
